entry.title: RT vitalik.eth: Another great book by @Delphi_Digital, this time on rollups.
entry.summary: RT vitalik.eth Another great book by @Delphi_Digital, this time on rollups. Jon Charbonneau: @VitalikButerin gave us An Incomplete Guide to Rollups I present The Complete Guide to Rollups :) Ok not quite but gud meme Enshrined (FINALLY), sovereign, smart contract, recursive… I go deep their tech + economics Ya it’s long, but tons of memes https://members.delphidigital.io/reports/the-complete-guide-to-rollups
